attributes.title: no
attributes.review: honestly i just don’t like trump. Plus this app made my phone glitch REALLY BAD and i downloaded it just to see why people were voting for him but i honestly still don’t like him

attributes.title: Little Cheeto bunker boy🍊🧚🏻👁👄👁
attributes.review:
This app gave my cousin epilepsy😱 
He later passed away 😞
Then orange ninjas showed up at my house saying “SUPPORT OR DIE!!!” But kicked them in the balls and said “eat that Cheeto boy” they cried like little girls all the way home. 
Thank you Trump you little Cheeto boy

attributes.title: Absolutely the worst
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did it gave my phone a freaking virus. Save yourself The time and stay away.

attributes.title: Horrendous App
attributes.review: It took forever to download and asked for credit card information. I think we should get rid of this for spying instead 😡😡.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: Very buggy. As soon as I opened it,it was acting weird and it crashed. I tried giving it a chance but that shouldn’t happen.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: The whole idea of this all is ridiculous. It’s meant to shame people for not being someone specific. The person it’s for is dumber than a horse. But only he’s orange!

attributes.title: Praised Be
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to read more about Donald’s policies so that I could understand why anyone would support him. The only thing this app taught me is that anyone who supports his policies needs therapy.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
This app took me weeks to install! When launching the app it played a music and that music brought MANY Cockroaches
And I have a HUGE fear of bugs! This app better be deleted  or
I will END you 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: There is plenty of fascist rhetoric here. I want to see what’s all the fuss about and why would I vote for Trump in the year of 2020. But unfortunately all that I found was a bunch of fake news and sheep. Embarrassing really.

attributes.title: Black Lives matter
attributes.review: Do not download this app it’s horrible i thought this app would be about selling oranges but it’s nothing like that at all this is a bunch of false advertisement smh 😭😒
